content.label: This game improves on the original in almost every way.  Awesome.
Fun
Excellent battle system allows for a significant amount of strategy combined with the thrill of random chance.
This is one of the most fun games I have ever played. Combines comics and chance brilliantly.
Optional

I'm in love with this game. Slot machine RPGs are honestly much more fun than I thought and this game is a perfect example. Also, no IAPs!! The game costs $5 but it's worth it because no ads or IAPs and the game is crisp and smooth. UPDATE:Volume 5 is fan freaking tastic. This is the only game I won't get tired of.
Solid gameplay. Even though I'm sick and tired of seeing zombie games this was fun!
Having a great time playing this game!  I really like the comic book feel of it!

name.label: Love the NFL, hate the DirecTV

content.label: Improves on the origial in almost every way, although it can be very difficult to read on small devices.

This iteration of king cashing wraps up the oddball concept if a slot machine RPG and gives it a proper presentation.  It wears thin on extended playthroughs, but in short bursts it's great fun.  Thankfully the zombie theme is light and humorous.

Major improvement from the first one. The first one didn't have much after you beat the game. I'm on the second story only because I am a completion it's who needs gold. It's so much better than the first.
Nothing short of perfection.
RPG elements mixed with slots and an awesome item system, great graphic style! A blast, buy it now.
Creative fighting style
Really fun
Awesome sequel, loads better than the first!!!! Great twist on the standard rpg format- GET THIS NOW!!!!
A lot of grinding but still fun so far...
The game has great style and fun gameplay.
I haven't played the original, but this one is fun and clever. I really like the gameplay, as well as the comic-style story and battle selection. It's really quite clever.

At first I thought this app would be too simple or boring but after finishing the first few battles I found it very addictive.  I just had to keep playing to try and unlock the next battle and upgrade my latest loot.  You cam easily play for hours or only a few minutes if that is all you have.

I had serious doubts if I would enjoy this game. The low price and home sick made me try it.

I a beyond pleased. This game has depth that is deceptive on looking at it initially.  Additionally, it is sheer joy and such fun to play. 

I highly suggest giving this special game a whirl.
Simple, but fun RPG integration...great graphics and tunes. Highly recommended!

title.label: Fun, hours of game play, and no in app purchases!

content.label: The game is all there.  No BS.  No ads.  Just a fun game. Yay. Finally.
I thought the first one was addictive. They sped up gameplay, and grinding is not tedious. All around a fantastic game.
Very fun to just pick up and play
You must buy it!!!!
Don't hesitate and look for other games, buy this. No iap and great rewarding gameplay.
A friend turned me on to this game and I have been pleased. The items and combinations lead to a lot of depth and customization.
Simple concept , excellent execution, no IAP, fun game overall. Highly recommend. Totally worth price tag with nothing more to buy ever.
Such an improvement from the first game. I love it, love the graphic novel style, the characters , gameplay, graphics, love everything! Perfect game! Love grinding my characters too!
One of those rare games that you can enjoy in short bursts while waiting in line or lose yourself in for hours. Love the comic book style storytelling. Do yourself a favor and get this game!

What a great RPG style, pick up and go game.  
Dev has/is adding such great content.

I got this since I enjoyed the first one. There's alot of polish when compared to most apps. Great art style, fun progression, loot variety, and slot action. The addition of a customizable 3  group party adds a lot of variety and strategy. 

The few improvements I'd suggest would be better character specialization s. Some are good, while others seem generic and weaker than the others. Same goes with weapons.

title.label: Goes from okay to rampantly addicting fast

content.label: When I first played the game I was only sort of into the slot style battle system. But then I got more and more into the comic book style storyline combined with the chance to try and achieve gold stars and I was hooked. They keep feeding you new content at all the right times to keep you invested without feeling overwhelmed or overconfident. Really takes a concept and works it to bring it to a high level of entertainment
This game has excellent length, gameplay, sound, art, and music. Everything about it oozes quality.
So much better than the first, and the first was already amazing. A definite buy, especially when it's on sale like now!
Interesting and fun to play in short bursts. Really cool art and story.
Fun game, much more challenging than the first.  Enjoying the new visuals.

title.label: Overrated. First one is much better.

content.label:
This is a great example of exagerrated reviews. The first game is better. This game:
- no map = less sense of progression. 
- no ladder based levels. 
- no extra "survival" mode.
- cant turn OFF the animations. The simple reel animation or flashing of attacking items/combos was good enough! Dont need the new flashy animations. 

This game is not much of an improvement. Dont believe the 5 star reviews. Regretting this purchase. This game misses the subtle features that make the first game a classic and much much more fun.
It's easy yet rewarding.
I am beginning to like hybrid RPGs more than any other game style. Wish these guys could incorporate Lord of the Rings content into this engine.
So i'm sucked into this version too, and I like the comic book setup.  I was expecting the same game but this is better.  Somehow.
Must play for fan of both genres
For something so simple in concept it has really grabbed me!

This is a great game whether I have a few minutes or a few hours. I played the first one, which I enjoyed as well, but this brings the game to a whole new level. The comic book style progression is fun as well as the secret levels and upgrades. There is enough to keep coming back for more. 

Worth every penny.

If slot games are your thing then this is a great one. I can see why people like this but personally slots are not my thing. I don't like losing based on random chance but rather my own skill. There is really no strategy in this or any sort of skill needed. Great if you are just looking for a mindless way to waste a few minutes.
Awesome game all around. Seriously addicting. All it needs is an endless mode for longevity though still looking forward to updates!

title.label: Really fun game.  Casino Rpg style.

content.label: Great game.

Even better then the first King Cashing. It's very addicting. Also there is no IAP crap to deal with. Just a great game for a good price. More developers should take note. I would recommend to anyone. 5 stars
This sequel steps it up! Better graphics and music, and a funny and entertaining comic book style plot. Same fun gameplay with some tweaks to further improve
